about_the_game:
Super Turbo Racing has been expanded since previous versions.
Now the game have more cars and new opponents in the tarmac.

Super Turbo Racing is your drag racing game.
The game has been designed to be light and compact.
It's very easy to get the hang of the controls in the game.
Super Turbo Racing has plenty of options of controller.
You can choose mouse, keyboard control or XBOX controller to play the game.

In the game you have many cars to choose.
You buy cars in the game to beat stronger rivals.
Better cars allow to join harder races with harder drivers.

The game have a single player mode with many options of opponents.
You can choose among american car battles, german car duels and also super sport cars.

The main goal is to compete to defeat all rivals and get better rides until you collect all luxury cars available so you become the ultimate collector.

name: Super Turbo Racing

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Dual core @ 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible with 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad core @ 3 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible with 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Super Turbo Racing is your drag racing game. The main goal of the game is to defeat all rivals, earn money in-game and become the ultimate car collector, own every luxury car in the game.
